r.d: Package containes locale validation for BE such as: * Postal Code * Bank Account Number * Transfer message (transfer from an bank account to another) * VAT * Natitonal ID * Identity Card Number * SIS CARD ID (belgian "sécurité sociale" ID)
r.n: -Done- Post Code -Done- Bank Account Number -Todo- Transfer message (transfer from an bank account to another) -Done- VAT -Done- Natitonal ID -Todo- Identity Card Number -Done- SIS CARD ID (belgian "sécurité sociale" ID)
